ygData.messageBody:
thats what the bank is for, it has a shared bank for
all your toons lol.


--- Greg <freechylde@...> wrote:
> The whole question stemmed from a debate a friend
> and I had. He said
> that coin was no-longer droppable. I knew that you
> couldnt drop coin
> on the ground.
>
> But he said..insisted rather that you could no
> longer move plat around
> between characters on the same account. I dont
> believe that for that
> would be bad for those of us who farm for our play
> to aide the lower
> toons on our accounts.
>
> Greg
>
>
>
